DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to investigate whether patients preoperatively treated with acetylsalicylic acid and/or clopidogrel have fewer perioperative bleeding and lower amounts of blood substitution when managed by ROTEM (whole blood coagulation analyzer) and MULTIPLATE (thrombocyte function analyzer).
DOC.brief_title: Goal-orientated Therapy of Perioperative Disturbance in Hemostasis in Cardiac Surgery
